text.section: If the defendant is able to pay, he shall pay all fees and costs associated with this action.

If the defendant is found by the court to be indigent, all fees and costs shall be waived and defendant shall be represented by an attorney from, or under contract to the Department of Public Advocacy.

law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 443, sec. 45, effective July 13, 1990.
